mapper.select: select b.SERIALID, b.CUSTNO, b.BANKNO, b.BANKACCO, b.BANKACCODISPLAY, b.BANKIDTP, b.BANKIDNO, b.BANKIDVALIDDT, b.BANKACNM, b.BANKMOBILE, b.SUBBANKNO, b.BANKLONGNAME, b.ISSIGN, b.SIGNNO, b.BANKPROEXISTS, b.PROTOCOL_NO, b.STATE, b.OPENDT, b.CLOSEDT, b.DISORDER, b.UPDATETIMESTAMP, t.TRADEACCO, t.FUNDCORPNO from tradeaccoinfo t, bankcardinfo b where t.bankserialid = b.serialid and t.TRADEACCOST = 'N' and b.STATE = 'Y' and t.CUSTNO = #{custno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by b.MAINFLAG desc
